replies.body: Never used DFG as mordekaiser. Got a Buff for none DFG User.
Actually a nerf though. They cut his health regen by 70%... that's a nerf.
He may have been "compensated", but I find him more fun. I feel like his W is more interactive now, and you can escort people out of a situation

> He may have been "compensated", but I find him more fun. I feel like his W is more interactive now, and you can escort people out of a situation

Great, they turned him from a nuker to a support "tank".
He does still feel like a chore to play, I'll give you that.
But he is a big guy in a heavy armor with a mace o spades, he have more sense be a tank than a mage IMO.
Veigar and him are crying over what Riot calls buffs :/

Morde's winrate went up by about 7%

All the pro's who looked at the changes called them buffs

I play him and consider them huge buffs, although he still lacks a dfg replacement item (120 AP 10%cdr)

Comparing him to the veigar gutting is foolish.
